page.title: 12CHANGING TIMES:EMPLOYMENT 2
page.content: There are two Fire Stations in our area one soley for airport use and the other for local use. The men at the airport work a shift system of seven men during airport hours. At nights one shift will be "on call" in case of an emergency. Quite a few of the men live outwith our area. At the local fire station the men are part_time and are only at the station for drills and in the case of emergencies. The Castguards are only auxiliary, but are called out in emergencies and also, visit the "hut" from time to time. The two hotels and the Sumburgh Social Club employ people seasonly for part_time and full_time work. The traditional industries of farming and fishing employ fewer people today.
